title: Object - Issuer Authorized Shares Adjustment Transaction
description: Object describing an event to change the number of authorized shares at the issuer level.

new_shares_authorized.description: The new number of shares authorized for this issuer as of the event of this transaction

board_approval_date.description: Date on which the board approved the change to the issuer

stockholder_approval_date.description: Date on which the stockholders approved the change to the issuer
